verbs.description: [ARG1: Oil prices] [V: rallied] [ARG4: to multi - year highs] [ARGM-TMP: on Wednesday] , [ARGM-TMP: a day after President Donald Trump announced plans to withdraw the US from the Iran nuclear deal] .
Oil prices rallied to multi - year highs on Wednesday , a day after [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: announced] [ARG1: plans to withdraw the US from the Iran nuclear deal] .
Oil prices rallied to multi - year highs on Wednesday , a day after [ARG0: President Donald Trump] announced plans to [V: withdraw] [ARG1: the US] [ARG2: from the Iran nuclear deal] .
